column1: Jalalpur is a town and a municipal board in Ambedkar Nagar district in the India state of Uttar Pradesh.
Jalalpur is located at 25.85°N 79.82°E﻿ / 25.85; 79.82. It has an average elevation of 118 metres (387 ft).
The city is directly connected to Azamgarh

column3: 634. Males constitute 51% of the population and females 49%. Jalalpur has an average literacy rate of 69%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 73%
column5: and female literacy is 64%. In Jalalpur
column6: 16% of the population is under 6 years of age.
